description: This pipeline finds clusters of galaxies using WAZP
name: wazp_new
xml_workflow:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<pipeline name="WAZP">
  <info>
    <group value="cluster"/>
    <stage value="science"/>
    <owner value="ogando"/>
    <description>This pipeline finds clusters of galaxies using WAZP</description>
  </info>
  <taskgroup id="slice" desc="WAZP Components">
    <task checked="checked" name="Slicing" flow="1to1" confName="Slicing" config="yes" id="wazp_slice_zmag">
      <components>
        <component name="Slicing" id="wazp_slice_zmag"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Split Area" flow="1toN" confName="Tiling" config="no" id="wazp_split_area">
      <components>
        <component name="Split Area" id="wazp_split_area"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_class"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Visibility Maps" flow="1to1" confName="Visibility maps" config="no" id="wazp_visibility_maps">
      <components>
        <component name="Visibility Maps" id="wazp_visibility_maps"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="calib_zmag_slice"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_class"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_split_area">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="tile_vertices"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="footprint_txt"/>
          <!--file mimetype="application/fits-table" class="vac_cluster" optional="True"/-->
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Background modelling per tile" flow="1to1" confName="Background" config="no" id="wazp_bkg_model">
      <components>
        <component name="Background modelling per tile" id="wazp_bkg_model"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="calib_zmag_slice"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_class"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_split_area">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="tile_vertices"/>
          <!--file mimetype="application/fits-table" class="vac_cluster" optional="True"/-->
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_visibility_maps">
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="visibility_map_trim"/>
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="vac_cluster"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Background concatenation" flow="Nto1" confName="Background" config="no" id="wazp_bkg_concat">
      <components>
        <component name="Background concatenation" id="wazp_bkg_concat"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="calib_zmag_slice"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_class"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_split_area">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" class="tiles_list" optiona="True"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_visibility_maps">
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="visibility_map_trim"/>
          <!-- file mimetype="application/fits-table" class="vac_cluster" optional="True"/-->
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_bkg_model">
          <file mimetype="application/x-tar" optional="True" class="bkg_model"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="WAZP split per tile" transfer="False" flow="1toN" display="hidden" confName="WAZP" config="no" id="wazp_pre_tile">
      <components>
        <component name="WAZP split per tile" id="wazp_pre_tile"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="calib_zmag_slice"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_split_area">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="tile_vertices"/>
          <!--file mimetype="application/fits-table" class="vac_cluster" optional="True"/-->
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_visibility_maps">
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="visibility_maps"/>
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="vac_cluster"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_bkg_concat">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="bkg_model"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="bkg_model_mag"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Cluster detection per tile" flow="1to1" confName="WAZP" config="no" id="wazp_tile">
      <components>
        <component name="Cluster detection per tile" id="wazp_tile"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="calib_zmag_slice"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_class"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_split_area">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="tile_vertices"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="tile_max_area"/>
          <!--file mimetype="application/fits-table" class="vac_cluster" optional="True"/-->
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_visibility_maps">
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="visibility_maps"/>
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="vac_cluster"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_bkg_concat">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="bkg_model"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="bkg_model_mag"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="no" flow="Nto1" name="Clusters concatenation" id="wazp_concatenate">
      <components>
        <component id="wazp_concatenate" multithreaded="True" name="Clusters concatenation"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_slice_zmag">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="wazp_config"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_area"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="vac_class"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_split_area">
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="tiles_list"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="wazp_tile">
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="cluster_list"/>
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="True" class="member_list"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="tile_coords"/>
          <file mimetype="image/png" optional="True" class="histo_zp"/>
          <file mimetype="image/png" optional="True" class="zph_mag"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
  </taskgroup>
</pipeline>

name: install_catalogs
xml_workflow:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<pipeline name="Install Catalogs">
  <info>
    <group value="hidden"/>
    <stage value="data_installation"/>
    <owner value="riccardo.campisano"/>
    <description/>
  </info>
  <taskgroup id="main" desc="Install Catalogs">
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Download" id="download_request">
      <components>
        <component name="Download Request" id="download_request"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
          <config type="string" id="product" value="cats"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Install" id="install_catalogs">
      <components>
        <component name="Catalog Installation" id="install_catalogs"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
  </taskgroup>
</pipeline>

description: Creates a catalog based on user configuration, joining all the input products and produces a log with the catalog characterization
name: vac_cluster
xml_workflow:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<pipeline name="Cluster">
  <info>
    <group value="valueadded_catalog"/>
    <stage value="valueadded_catalog"/>
    <owner value="angelofausti"/>
    <description>Creates a catalog based on user configuration, joining all the input products and produces a log with the catalog characterization</description>
  </info>
  <taskgroup id="catalog" desc="Cluster Catalog">
    <task checked="checked" name="Query Builder" flow="1to1" confName="Catalog Definition" config="yes" id="query_builder">
      <components>
        <component name="Query Builder" id="query_builder"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Catalog Properties" flow="1to1" confName="Catalog Properties" config="no" id="catalog_properties">
      <components>
        <component name="Catalog Properties" id="catalog_properties"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="query_builder">
          <config type="string" id="table"/>
          <config type="string" id="tag"/>
          <config type="string" id="extinction"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photoz_method"/>
          <config type="string" id="color_cut_gr"/>
          <config type="string" id="color_cut_ri"/>
          <config type="string" id="color_cut_iz"/>
          <config type="string" id="color_cut_zY"/>
          <file mimetype="image/png" optional="True" class="vac"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="zmax"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="footprintarea"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="nobjs"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="mag_type"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
  </taskgroup>
</pipeline>

description: From a selected release tag, it downloads coadd images, objects catalog and masks from DESDM and register/ingest them in the local database and archive file system
name: data_installation
xml_workflow:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<pipeline name="Data Installation">
  <info>
    <group value="hidden"/>
    <stage value="data_installation"/>
    <owner value="campisano"/>
    <description>From a selected release tag, it downloads coadd images, objects catalog and masks from DESDM and register/ingest them in the local database and archive file system</description>
  </info>
  <taskgroup id="main" desc="Data Installation">
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1toN" name="Download Request" id="download_request">
      <components>
        <component name="Download Request" id="download_request"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Install Images" id="install_images">
      <components>
        <component name="Image Installation" id="install_images"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="download_request">
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="tilename"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="image_path"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="pngs_dir"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="fits_dir"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="band"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Install Mangle Masks" id="install_mask">
      <components>
        <component name="Mangle Mask Installation" id="install_mask"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="download_request">
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="tilename"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="display_name"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="release_tag"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="field_tag"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="no" flow="Nto1" name="Check Images" id="check_install_images">
      <components>
        <component name="Check Images" id="check_install_images"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="install_images">
          <config type="int" optional="True" id="tot_fits"/>
          <config type="int" optional="True" id="tot_pngs"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="t_fits"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="t_pngs"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="t_rgbs"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="t_thumb"/>
          <config type="float" optional="True" id="t_zoom"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Install Catalogs" id="install_catalogs">
      <components>
        <component name="Catalog Installation" id="install_catalogs"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="download_request">
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="display_name"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="release_tag"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="field_tag"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Combined masks" id="consolidate_mask">
      <components>
        <component name="Combined mask ingestion" id="consolidate_mask"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="download_request">
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="display_name"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="release_tag"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="field_tag"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="install_mask">
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="warnings"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="mask_path"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="masktilestatus"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="mol_status"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="coadd_mol_status"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="tilename"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
  </taskgroup>
</pipeline>

description: This pipeline computes photo-z for diffent algorithms and ingest.
name: photoz_compute
xml_workflow:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<pipeline name="Photo-z Compute">
  <info>
    <group value="data_preparation"/>
    <stage value="data_preparation"/>
    <owner value="ogando"/>
    <readme>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yHUklXgtOz6rI9ERVJOhXHUdzez8jeVjFqUGNGUC0wA/edit?usp=sharing</readme>
    <description>This pipeline computes photo-z for diffent algorithms and ingest.</description>
  </info>
  <taskgroup id="data_partitioning" desc="Data Partitioning">
    <task checked="checked" name="Trainings Separation" flow="1to1" confName="Trainings Separation" config="yes" id="photoz_separate">
      <components>
        <component name="Trainings Separation" id="photoz_separate"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="Data Partitioner" flow="1toN" confName="Data Partitioner" config="yes" id="data_partitioning">
      <components>
        <!-- Reads 1 "pype_input" "text/xml" pype_input to retrieve Release and Field from provenance -->
        <component id="sky_partitioner" multithreaded="False" name="Sky Partitioner"/>
        <!-- Produces N "system" "text/json" files, one per core, each of them defines N partition healpix ids and their areas -->
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
  </taskgroup>
  <taskgroup id="photoz" desc="Photo-z">
    <task checked="checked" config="yes" flow="1to1" name="Data Retriever" id="data_retriever">
      <components>
        <!-- Reads 1 "system" "text/json" file that defines N partition healpix ids and their areas, or a query to produce fits from database -->
        <component id="partition_retriever" multithreaded="True" name="Partition Retreiver"/>
        <!-- True is a test: the task CODES need an entire node, and is the next of this block of tasks -->
        <!-- Produces MULTIPLE "science" "application/fits-table" file containing a partition element data for this core -->
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="data_partitioning">
          <file mimetype="text/json" class="system"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
    <task checked="checked" name="CODES" confName="Photometric Redshifts" version="001" config="yes" id="codes">
      <components default="dnf">
        <component id="dnf" multithreaded="True" name="DNF"/>
        <component id="annz" multithreaded="True" name="ANNz"/>
        <component id="annz2" multithreaded="True" name="ANNz2"/>
        <component id="bpz" multithreaded="True" name="BPZ"/>
        <component id="mlz" multithreaded="True" name="MLZ"/>
        <component id="lephare_new" multithreaded="True" name="LePhare"/>
      </components>
      <dependencies>
        <dependency id="scienceportal">
          <file mimetype="text/xml" source="scienceportal" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="photoz_separate">
          <!-- trainings /-->
          <file mimetype="application/x-tar" optional="True" class="training/annz"/>
          <file mimetype="application/x-tar" optional="True" class="training/annz2"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="training/bpz"/>
          <file mimetype="text/table" optional="True" class="training/dnf"/>
          <file mimetype="application/x-tar" optional="True" class="training/mlz"/>
          <file mimetype="text/plain" optional="True" class="mlz_configuration"/>
          <file mimetype="text/table" optional="True" class="training/lephare"/>
          <!--General /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="n_inputs"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="zp_corr_type"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="zeropoint_table"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="des_filters"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="stage"/>
          <!--annz /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photo_type_annz"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="t_set"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photo_type_annz2"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="obs_type_annz2"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="Annz2"/>
          <!-- annz2 /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="type_annz2"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="nMLMs"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="nErrKNN"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="rndOptTypes"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="z_max"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="z_min"/>
          <!-- bpz /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photo_type_bpz"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="SPECTRA"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="PRIOR"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="stage"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="DZ"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="ZMIN"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="ZMAX"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="INTERP"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="EXCLUDE"/>
          <!-- dnf /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photo_type_dnf"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="dnf_type"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="dnf_version"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="pdf_start"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="pdf_stop"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="pdf_step"/>
          <!-- mlz /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photo_type_mlz"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="obs_type_mlz"/>
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="MLZ"/>
          <!-- lephare_new /-->
          <config type="string" optional="True" id="photo_type_lephare"/>
        </dependency>
        <dependency id="data_retriever">
          <file mimetype="application/fits-table" optional="False" class="science"/>
        </dependency>
      </dependencies>
    </task>
  </taskgroup>
  <!--task id="annz2" name="ANNz2" config="no" confName="Photometric Redshift" checked="unchecked" version="001"><components><component id="annz2" name="ANNz2" multithreaded="True" /></components><dependencies><dependency id="photoz_separate"><file mimetype="application/x-tar" class="training/annz2" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="photo_type_annz2" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="obs_type_annz2" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="Annz2" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="type_annz2" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="nMLMs" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="nErrKNN" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="rndOptTypes" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="z_max" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="z_min" optional="True"/><config id="n_inputs" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="zp_corr_type" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="zeropoint_table" type="string" optional="True"/></dependency><dependency id="data_partitioning"><file mimetype="application/python-pickle" class="science" optional="False"/></dependency></dependencies></task-->
  <!--<task id="arborz" name="Arbor Z" config="no" confName="Photometric Redshift" checked="unchecked" version="001"><components><component id="arborz" name="ArborZ"/></components><dependencies><dependency id="photoz_separate"><file mimetype="application/x-tar" class="training/arborz" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="Arborz" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="photo_type_arborz" optional="True"/><config type="string" id="obs_type_arborz" optional="True"/><config id="t_set" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="n_inputs" type="string" optional="True"/></dependency><dependency id="data_partitioning"><file mimetype="application/python-pickle" class="science" optional="False"/></dependency></dependencies></task>-->
  <!--task id="bpz" name="BPZ" config="yes" confName="BPZ Photometric Redshift" checked="unchecked" version="001"><components><component id="bpz" name="BPZ" multithreaded="True"/></components><dependencies><dependency id="scienceportal"><file mimetype="text/xml" class="pype_input" value="pype_input.xml" source="scienceportal"/></dependency><dependency id="photoz_separate"><file mimetype="text/plain" class="training/bpz" optional="True"/><config id="photo_type_bpz" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="n_inputs" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="zp_corr_type" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="zeropoint_table" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="SPECTRA" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="PRIOR" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="stage" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="DZ" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="ZMIN" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="ZMAX" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="INTERP" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="EXCLUDE" type="string" optional="True"/><config id="des_filters" type="string" optional="True"/></dependency><dependency id="data_partitioning"><file mimetype="application/python-pickle" class="science" optional="False"/><config type="string" id="release" optional="False"/><config type="string" id="tag" optional="False"/></dependency></dependencies></task-->

  <taskgroup id="Consolidator" desc="Consolidator">
    <task config="yes" flow="Nto1" checked="checked" name="Concatenate Results" id="join_photoz_compute">

        <component name="Concatenate Results" id="join_photoz_compute"/>
